distributor.title: Resellers & Professionals
distributor.subtitle: Join the Biogance & Ekinat network
distributor.description: Distributor, pet shop, grooming salon, pharmacy, concept store...
distributor.paragraph1: Joining the Biogance network means choosing products made in France, using organic and natural ingredients, already available in over 40 countries worldwide.
distributor.paragraph2: Apply by clicking the link below to open your account. Once your application is submitted, our sales team will analyze the information provided and get back to you very soon.
benefits: Preferential offers and advantageous B2B terms (download the catalog)
Customized marketing tools (POS materials, visuals, promotional kits)

introParagraphs: Biogance combines science and nature to create organic, eco-certified, and environmentally friendly hygiene and care products for animals.

Founded in France, the brand is committed to animal well-being, sustainability, and innovation, offering safe, effective, and responsible formulas designed for the comfort and health of your companions.

Based in Angers, in the heart of Anjou, Biogance develops and manufactures its products in France, with a strong commitment to quality and transparency at every stage — from ingredient selection to the final formulation.
Our mission: to offer the best of nature and science for animal well-being.
partner.ambassadorDescription: At Biogance, we believe in authentic and long-lasting collaborations built on trust, passion, and shared values: respect for animals and the environment, their well-being, quality, and innovation.

ambassador.title: Become a Biogance Ambassador
ambassador.description: Join our community of pet lovers and represent Biogance's natural, eco-certified care. Share our values of wellness, innovation, and sustainability with pet owners worldwide.

common.motivationQuestion: In a few words, why would you like to become a Biogance ambassador?
common.agreement: I agree that my information may be used to review my application.

distributorForm.title: Become a Biogance Distributor
distributorForm.description: Join our global distribution network and represent Biogance in your region. Partner with a trusted French laboratory known for its organic, eco-certified, and innovative pet care solutions distributed in over 40 countries worldwide.

placeholders.message: e.g. Interested in distributing Biogance products

errors.businessEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

resellerForm.title: Become a Biogance Reseller
resellerForm.description: Offer your customers premium, eco-friendly pet care made in France. Join Biogance's professional network and bring natural, effective grooming and wellness products to pet owners in your community.

placeholders.message: e.g. Looking forward to offering Biogance in our boutique.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
